      • mineAt

        public static int mineAt(int y,
                         int x,
                         int sideL,
                         InitCellState[][] trueMF)
        Parameters:
        y - Integer height coordinate of cell
        x - Integer height coordinate of cell
        sideL - Length of array for bounds for both x and y coordinate search
        trueMF - The hint or count of mine neighbors that will be displayed on the true minefield
        Returns:
        Whether or not there is a mine at the state we're searching so that we can add to the neighbor mine count

        sideL - Length of array for bounds for both x and y coordinate search
        trueMF - Input enum array we want to count cells from

        The hint or count of mine neighbors that will be displayed on the true minefield
